alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 05 at 3:56PM EST until March 06 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Maumee River At Waterville affecting Lucas and Wood Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Portage River At Woodville affecting Sandusky and Wood Counties. Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck affecting Wayne and Holmes Counties. For the Portage River...including Woodville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maumee River...including Grand Rapids, Waterville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Killbuck Creek...including Killbuck...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maumee River At Waterville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, A few riverside cabins in Waterville become threatened. Lowland flooding occurs along with some water inundation on River Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EST Sunday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 PM EST Sunday was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 6.1 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.4 feet on 02/28/1929. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 200 AM EST.
